desc: A subscription delivery box featuring handmade Canadian items. The Local Mile Box supports small local Canadian businesses and artisans.

layout.text:
We are so glad you're here!
If you are searching for a delivery gift box company that invests in locally made, Canadian items, you are in the right place!
With every purchase of a Local Mile Box you help support the dreams of multiple small business owners and discover that special quality you can only find with handcrafted pieces.
In each of our seasonal surprise type boxes, themed gift boxes and custom boxes you will find a collection of handcrafted, one of a kind and useful pieces that will be sure to make you or that special someone smile. 
Shop Local, Support Local, Love Local
EXPLORE ALL OUR GIFT BOX COLLECTIONS HERE
